content: HSP Metal drywall anchor Self-drilling metal drywall anchor for faster, more reliable and more economical fastening to drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- ### FEATURES:Features Faster, more precise positioning – “Shark’s tooth” tip design bites into drywall with ease as you start drilling No pre-drilling needed – these drywall anchors cut their own thread Available without or without screws – select a HSP-S package for metal drywall anchors bundled with #8 x 1-3/16 screws, or HSP for the drywall anchors only Easier installation – set using any PH2 screwdriver, or the dedicated setting tool for ultimate efficiency using a power drill/driver Applications Plumbing Interior finishing Electrical installation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Zinc, die-casting Technical Data | Material composition | Zinc, die-casting | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2158777 - Drywall anchor HSP w/o screws - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSP Drywall anchor - 2158778 - Drywall anchor HSP w/ screws - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSP-S Drywall anchor - 3555249 - Drywall anchor HSP w/o screws MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1600x HSP Drywall anchor - 3555250 - Drywall anchor HSP w/ screws MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1600x HSP-S Drywall anchor
